revised_title: In-depth Study of Ornithorhynchus Development Stages
tldr: This article examines various stages of Ornithorhynchus development, including early segmentation, germinal-layer formation, gastrulation, and neural development. The authors provide detailed descriptions and observations of these stages, highlighting the unique characteristics of monotreme development. Their findings contribute to a better understanding of the early development of Ornithorhynchus and other monotremes.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
